Example: "Best CRM for startups"; "affordable sales automation"; "[Brand] vs [Competitor]"

Item: Pillar pages created for main topics
Example: /crm-for-startups with 2000+ words covering the topic comprehensively

Item: Feature and use case pages created
/pricing page with clear tiers in HTML text
Example: Starter $49/mo; Pro $99/mo; Enterprise $299/mo in a table
Each feature as H2 with description and specific metrics
/glossary/sales-automation with clear definitions LLMs can extract

Item: Zero-volume keywords researched (forums; support tickets; Reddit)
Example: Identify questions people ask but don't search for on Google

Item: Content lifecycle phase identified (Create / Grow / Optimize / Expand)
Example: Map each page to its lifecycle stage to prioritize actions
Flag pages with declining traffic or outdated information

Item: Data study planned with original research
Example: Survey or analysis producing unique statistics others will cite
